text: tanna kaṭṭaḍavannu allāhana bhaya hāgū avana meccugeya bunādiya mēle kaṭṭidavanu śrēṣṭhanō, athavā avanannū hottu narakakke kusidu bīḷaliruva, bhārī hoṇḍavondara asthira an̄cinalliruva bunādiya mēle tanna kaṭṭaḍavannu kaṭṭidavanu śrēṣṭhanō? Akramigaḷa paṅgaḍakke allāhanu saridāri tōrisuvudilla
